When linking your standard model to raw data, please make sure you open both files at the same time
When this happens, please go to the corresponding cells and override them with hard-coded number
There are two place where it is easily showing N/A
If it is a company with fiscal year end date in non-December, it is advised to check if our formula calcualtes numbers in the right period and if there is a blank column.
If not, please copy the formula from any of the future periods and paste it to the period where blank column exists

by adding and deducting the year/month figure in the function
